dict.string: We need access to your health data to track your workouts and activities
We need to update your health data with workout information, including distance, heart rate, and calories burned
We need your location to track your workouts, calculate distance, pace, and show your route on the map
We need your location to track your workouts in the background, calculate distance, pace, and show your route on the map
We need your location to track your workouts in the background, calculate distance, pace, and show your route on the map
